reviews.review_msg: This prof is amazing he is so kind and extremely knowledgeable and great at presentations. 10/10 would recommend as a prof. Heavy readings and lots of class discussions, but definitely worth it for his very fair marking

Very interesting lectures, takes many different angles on Greek/Balkan/Ottoman history. His research on Women and the law in Ottoman Greece is really cool. Tough marker though, one of the only times I have ever got a B in a history course.

Dr. Doxiadis is probably one of the best professors here at SFU (my 3rd course with him) . While he does issue a lot of reading, most of them are veryinteresting and he takes personal time in Tutorials to  help each student understand the material to the most rudamentary level, comparing them to modern concepts. I 100% reccomend this professor.
